body_html: One possibility is that the FFMPEG linked into tensorflow is conflicting with the FFMPEG in OpenCV. If they are different versions, then this is quite likely. You could try to remove the ffmpeg support from the tensorflow build and see if that solves your problem.
body_text: One possibility is that the FFMPEG linked into tensorflow is conflicting with the FFMPEG in OpenCV. If they are different versions, then this is quite likely. You could try to remove the ffmpeg support from the tensorflow build and see if that solves your problem.
body:
One possibility is that the FFMPEG linked into tensorflow is conflicting with the FFMPEG in OpenCV. If they are different versions, then this is quite likely. You could try to remove the ffmpeg support from the tensorflow build and see if that solves your problem. 

>
